page.title: 08RELIGION - HARMSTON & COLEBY
page.content: Both parishes lie within the Deanery of Graffoe,in the Diocese of Lincoln. They are administered by one priest, resident in{Harmston.}He serves also as part_time chaplain to both{Harmston Hall Hospital and to the open prison at Swinderby. The vicarage is always open to anyone with social problems, however severe. {CE SERVICES.}10.30am Mattins & Holy Communion or Evensong alternating between ALL SAINTS',{HARMSTON}and{ALL SAINTS',{COLEBY.} {MONDAY CLUB.}30-40 children aged 5-12 from both villages meet weekly at { {Harmston}for Bible study & prayer. {HOSPITAL PATIENTS. Harmston }Church. 9.30am Service 1st and 3rd Sundays, Holy Communion monthly. {COLEBY}METHODIST CHAPEL _ Branston Circuit. 10.30am Sundays. Involves residential home members.
